医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
确定对抗更年期引起的肥胖的新目标更年期期间雌激素的下降会导致身体脂肪分布的变化以及相关的心血管和代谢疾病，但一项新的研究发现了潜在的治疗方法，有一天可能会扭转这些不健康的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/New-target-identified-to-combat-menopause-induced-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/New-target-identified-to-combat-menopause-induced-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17616387-46cb-4c0c-9f42-16b67368d22b Fri, 16 Aug 2024 00:14:40 -0400 New target identified to combat menopause-induced obesity
研究人员敦促将边缘群体纳入其中，以缩小神经性贪食症治疗差距研究人员发现神经性贪食症治疗方面存在显着差异，敦促开展更具包容性的研究，以解决边缘化人群护理方面的差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Researchers-urge-inclusion-of-marginalized-groups-to-bridge-bulimia-nervosa-treatment-gaps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Researchers-urge-inclusion-of-marginalized-groups-to-bridge-bulimia-nervosa-treatment-gaps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38c6d082-f07a-4c62-a7a2-ea8b28557dd9 Fri, 16 Aug 2024 00:07:00 -0400 Researchers urge inclusion of marginalized groups to bridge bulimia nervosa treatment gaps
绘制莱姆病细菌图谱以更好地护理患者对莱姆病细菌的基因分析可能为改善蜱传疾病的诊断、治疗和预防铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Mapping-Lyme-bacteria-for-better-病人-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240816/Mapping-Lyme-bacteria-for-better-病人-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3b8e967-c5a9-4dce-ad5e-ebd227e1835d Fri, 16 Aug 2024 00:03:53 -0400 Mapping Lyme bacteria for better patient care
INTEGRA Biosciences 推出用于大容量磁珠实验方案的新配件INTEGRA Biosciences 为其 MAG 模块推出了深孔板适配器和磁性阵列。该适配器使 INTEGRA 最近推出的深孔板能够与 MAG 模块一起使用，支持大批量工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/INTEGRA-Biosciences-launches-new-accessories-for-high-volume-magic-bead-protocols.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/INTEGRA-Biosciences-launches-new-accessories-for-high-volume-magic-bead-protocols.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea45c63f-7e21-4edc-a846-c29f269cb5d7 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 23:57:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences launches new accessories for high volume magnetic bead protocols
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 倡议赋予美国原住民社区参与公共卫生研究的能力美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 启动了一项计划，支持美洲原住民社区领导公共卫生研究，以解决用药过量、药物滥用和疼痛问题，包括心理健康和保健等相关因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/NIH-initiative-empowers-Native-American-communities-in-public-health-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/NIH-initiative-empowers-Native-American-communities-in-public-health-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3ad015f-f253-4eca-9534-8d062c69378f Thu, 15 Aug 2024 23:37:00 -0400 NIH initiative empowers Native American communities in public health research
长期摄入咖啡因与心率和血压升高有关从咖啡到茶，含咖啡因饮料是全球早晨例行公事中不可或缺的一部分，但过量饮用这些流行饮料可能有害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Chronic-caffeine-conspiration-linked-to-elevated-heart-rate-and-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Chronic-caffeine-conspiration-linked-to-elevated-heart-rate-and-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0bbb17b-d950-48ef-963a-6068f8108b62 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 23:27:55 -0400 Chronic caffeine consumption linked to elevated heart rate and blood pressure
肠道微生物群在 2 型糖尿病管理中发挥着至关重要的作用研究揭示了肠道微生物群在 2 型糖尿病中的复杂作用，强调了个性化治疗策略以及微生物与抗糖尿病药物相互作用的复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Gut-microbiota-plays-a-crucial-role-in-type-2-diabetes-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Gut-microbiota-plays-a-crucial-role-in-type-2-diabetes-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5554077-2e3b-4930-8413-031ac29b2eed Thu, 15 Aug 2024 23:22:00 -0400 Gut microbiota plays a crucial role in type 2 diabetes management
研究表明动力织机织工的长期噪音暴露与血压升高有关在某些工作中，噪音暴露是一种已知的职业危害，尤其是听力损失、身体和心理压力以及注意力不集中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Study-links-chronic-noise-exposure-in-power-loom-weavers-to-increased-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Study-links-chronic-noise-exposure-in-power-loom-weavers-to-increased-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d07e6ebd-8fc1-4c3b-a75d-9ca1905c3274 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 23:05:38 -0400 Study links chronic noise exposure in power loom weavers to increased blood pressure
威尔康奈尔医学公司获得 1240 万美元的淋巴瘤研究资助威尔康奈尔医学公司获得了美国国立卫生研究院下属国家癌症研究所的一项为期五年、价值 1240 万美元的拨款，用于广泛的弥漫性大 B 细胞淋巴瘤 (DLBCL) 生物学基础和转化研究项目，最常见的淋巴瘤形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-secures-24124-million-grant-for-lymphoma-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-secures-24124-million-grant-for-lymphoma-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83fa80c9-ebe6-4ae9-99ed-6780b4738463 Thu, 15 Aug 2024 23:01:53 -0400 Weill Cornell Medicine secures $12.4 million grant for lymphoma research
联邦拨款支持加拿大女退伍军人无家可归问题的研究由劳森健康研究所领导的一项首个同类研究通过退伍军人无家可归计划获得了联邦政府 120 万加元的资助，以更好地了解加拿大退伍军人妇女的无家可归情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Federal-grant-supports-research-on-homeless-among-women-veterans-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240815/Federal-grant-supports-research-on-homeless-among-women-veterans-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25a558a7-e864-48ad-bd74-fbc321c8507b Thu, 15 Aug 2024 22:53:36 -0400 Federal grant supports research on homelessness among women veterans in Canada
